doc.after: Secular humanism is a comprehensive life stance or world view which embraces human reason metaphysical naturalism altruistic morality and distributive justice and consciously rejects supernatural claims theistic faith and religiosity pseudoscience and superstition 61 62 It is sometimes referred to as Humanism with a capital H and no qualifying adjective
